title: [BUG] SKCanvasView control crashes in .NET 7 and 8 MAUI
body: ### Description When navigating to a **ContentPage** with an **SKCanvasView** the app will crash. In Windows there is no error message, but debugger throws to the highlighted in `app.g.i.cs`: And when launching into the Android emulator, I get the following Unhandled Exception: `Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException: 'Handler not found for view SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls.SKCanvasView.'` ### Code The best way to share code for larger projects is a link to a GitHub repository: https://github.com/user/repo/tree/bug-123 But, you can also share a short block of code here: ```cs using SkiaSharp; using SkiaSharp.Views.Maui; namespace SkiaSharpMaui8; public partial class MainPage : ContentPage { public MainPage() => InitializeComponent(); private void OnPaintSurface(object sender, SKPaintSurfaceEventArgs e) { SKSurface surface = e.Surface; SKCanvas canvas = surface.Canvas; canvas.Clear(SKColors.White); SKPaint paint = new() { Style = SKPaintStyle.Stroke, Color = SKColors.Black, StrokeWidth = 2 }; SKRect sKRect = new(20, 20, 360, 360); canvas.DrawRect(sKRect, paint); } } ``` You can also share some XAML: ```xaml ``` ### Expected Behavior I expected to have a canvas with a rectangle drawn on it. ### Actual Behavior The application crashed upon loading a page with an SKCanvasView. ### Version of SkiaSharp 2.88.3 (Current) ### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp 2.88.2 (Previous) ### IDE / Editor Visual Studio (Windows) ### Platform / Operating System Android, Windows ### Platform / Operating System Version - Windows 11 ### Devices - Android API 33 ### Relevant Screenshots _No response_ ### Relevant Log Output _No response_ ### Code of Conduct - [X] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
